info.author: ritzMo
info.name: MovieEPG
info.shortdescription: Access the EPG from within the Movie Player
info.description: Allows you to access the service list and plugins requiring access to the service list (e.g. Graphical Multi EPG) from within the standard movie player. DO NOT install this plugin if you're using a nonstandard movie player, e.g. EMC. It will probably break and you might end up with a unusable movie player until you uninstall one of the conflicting plugins.
